items.sentence: This is the nicest present I\'ve ever received.
Tom always keeps Mary\'s picture in his wallet.
Tom didn\'t have any idea how long he\'d slept.
If you ask me, Tom is the one with the problem.
Country roads aren\'t as crowded as city roads.
Tom told Mary that she should take an umbrella.
Tom told Mary the story that John had told him.
Tom told Mary why it was a bad idea to do that.
Tom told me I was the one he wanted to talk to.
Don\'t throw it away just because it\'s broken.
